item.title: More photos from Alabama: Cathedral Caverns, Autumn at Monte Sano, and pumpkins
item.description:
I’m finally getting around to sifting through some of the photos I’ve taken over the past couple of months and uploading them to Flickr. Here’s the one from the first batch taken at Cathedral Caverns in Scottsboro, AL:
And here are some shots I took of the Autumn trees from up on Monte Sano:
And a few shots of our pumpkins from Halloween:

item.title: San Fran and Pumpkins
item.description:
Have some pics up from my trip to the bay area up at Flickr:
Was a good trip overall. Real good to see Richy and Carrie and get to hang out with them some and see some sights. Got up to the Golden Gate bridge, although didn’t see that much since it was really foggy. Headed down to the Fisherman’s Wharf and wandered around there for a while checking out the sea lions and Ghirardelli and such.
